named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findByMonitorTypeId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a WHERE a.monitorTypeId = :monitorTypeId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorTruthValueInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorTruthValueInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorStringValueInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorStringValueInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorNumericValueInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorNumericValueInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId
